articles.description: England suffer a four-wicket defeat in the opening one-day international of the Women's Ashes in Sydney.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: Ash Gardner leads Australia to four-wicket win in opening ODI

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka opens her Australian Open title defence with a straight-set victory over American Sloane Stephens.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Aryna Sabalenka begins title defence with victory over Sloane Stephens

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says he will not stand in right-back Kyle Walker's way if he decides to leave this month.
articles.title: Kyle Walker: Manchester City defender wants to 'explore' options aboard, says Pep Guardiola

articles.description: The Houston Texans' defence stuns the Los Angeles Chargers 32-12 to progress to week two of the NFL play-offs.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: Houston Texans beat Los Angeles Chargers on Wildcard Weekend

articles.description: After a stormy start, has Ruben Amorim finally found the right formula at Manchester United?
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: What changes Manchester United boss has made tactically since joining club

articles.description: Harry Kane scores the only goal from the penalty spot as Bayern Munich restored their four-point lead at the top of the German Bundesliga with a 1-0 win over Borussia Monchengladbach.
articles.title: Borussia M'gladbach 0-1 Bayern Munich: Harry Kane penalty sends visitors four clear at top

articles.description: Anthony Joshua calls for a long-awaited fight with British rival Tyson Fury to happen in 2025.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua next fight: AJ says Tyson Fury fight has to happen in 2025

articles.description: Zheng Qinwen recovered from a "stupid mistake" to begin her Australian Open bid with a straight-set win on a rain-disrupted first day in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Zheng Qinwen and Mirra Andreeva win on rain-disrupted first day

articles.description: Josh Bassett scores a hat-trick as Leicester Tigers recover from a sloppy start to beat Ulster and secure qualification for the knockout stage of the Investec Champions Cup.
articles.title: Leicester Tigers 38-10 Ulster: Josh Bassett scores hat-trick as Tigers secure progress

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot praises Trent Alexander-Arnold for brushing off last week's poor performance against Manchester United with an influential display in Saturday's 4-0 FA Cup victory over Accrington Stanley.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: Liverpool full-back praised for reaction to criticism
